MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: WinXP,WinVista,WinVista x64,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,Linux,Linux Gnome,Linux GPL,Linux Open Source
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Cleans more junk and trace files. Improves usability on Vista and Windows 7. Fixes bugs. Update 19 other translations.
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: Windows XP, Vista or 7 or Linux.

English.Keywords: cleaner, privacy, disk space, cache, internet history, temporary files, cookies, junk, open source, free
English.Char_Desc_45: Clean disk space and maintain privacy--free
English.Char_Desc_80: Free valuable disk space and maintain your privacy with ease
English.Char_Desc_250: BleachBit deletes unnecessary files to free valuable disk space, maintain privacy, and remove junk. Rid your system of old clutter including cache, cookies, Internet history, localizations, logs, temporary files, and broken shortcuts. Shred files.
English.Char_Desc_450: BleachBit deletes unnecessary files to free valuable disk space, maintain privacy, and remove junk. Rid your system of old clutter including cache, cookies, Internet history, localizations, logs, temporary files, and broken shortcuts. Applications include Internet Explorer, Firefox, Flash, Google Chrome, Opera, Windows Media Player, and many others. Securely shred files. Wipe free disk space to hide previously deleted files.
English.Char_Desc_2000: BleachBit deletes unnecessary files to free valuable disk space, maintain privacy, and remove junk. Rid your system of old clutter including cache, cookies, Internet history, localizations, logs, temporary files, and broken shortcuts. Designed for Linux and Windows systems, it wipes clean Adobe Reader, APT, Bash, Beagle, Chromium, Epiphany, Firefox, Flash, GIMP, Google Chrome, Google Earth, Internet Explorer, Java, KDE, OpenOffice.org, Opera, RealPlayer, Safari, Skype, VIM, XChat, Yum, and more. Securely shred files to prevent undelete. Wipe free disk space to hide previously deleted files. Automate cleaning in batch files.
